meanings.definition: Work done in a yard to maintain or improve its appearance.
meanings.sent1: I enjoy doing yardwork on weekends to keep my garden neat.
meanings.sent2: After the storm, there was a lot of yardwork to be done to clean up the fallen branches.
meanings.sent3: My dog thinks yardwork is a game and always tries to help by digging holes.
meanings.sent4: To me, yardwork is like painting a picture with plants and flowers as my colors.
meanings.sent5: The smell of freshly cut grass always reminds me of the satisfying feeling of completing yardwork.

meanings.definition: The act of mowing, trimming, and cleaning a yard.
meanings.sent1: Every Saturday, my dad does yardwork to make sure our lawn looks nice.
meanings.sent2: During summer, yardwork becomes a daily task to keep the yard looking tidy.
meanings.sent3: My brother tried to avoid yardwork by pretending to be a bush, but we found him easily.
meanings.sent4: The sound of the lawnmower is like music to my ears when I'm doing yardwork.
meanings.sent5: I always feel accomplished after a day of yardwork, seeing the transformation of the yard.
